name: rtlsdr_radio
description: Receive FM and DAB/DAB+ radio using RTL-SDR USB tuners.
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Receive FM and DAB/DAB+ radio using RTL-SDR USB tuners.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.3.1 - Classical composer portraits via Open Opus API fallback when Last.fm has no artwork. v1.3.0 - Fixed FM artwork throttle bug; Debug logging controlled by settings.
